title: Thomas Jefferson Memorial: Bookstore
body: Bookstore       The Thomas Jefferson Memorial bookstore is open daily from 9:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. and offers books about Thomas Jefferson and the American Colonial, Revolutionary War, and Early Republic periods. The bookstore is operated by Eastern National, a partner of the National Park Service that sells books and other educational materials and operates many other bookstores at national park sites throughout the country. Proceeds from sales support National Mall and Memorial Parks and other National Parks.
